rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG} owned by {50000567}
For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true

description: The unit studies Canadian, Australian, English and US case law and theory on the principle of unjust enrichment. The unit will cover: the elements of the unjust enrichment principle, the substantive areas for which it appears to be the principle underlying the granting of relief, the remedies and defences that are available, and the applicability of the unjust enrichment analysis to restitutionary claims for benefits secured through wrongdoing.
